lyrics:
[Intro]
PCD
T.O.P
Top of the world
PCD
T.O.P
Top of the world

[Chorus]
Give me them bright lights, long nights (come on)
Party till the sun is rising
High rise, over time (Pussycat Dolls)
Give me them bright lights, long nights
Party till the sun is rising
High rise, over time
Work until the moon is shining
Hot guys, fly girls
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world
I feel on top of the world, hey

[Verse 1]
I'm ready for the pressure
The drama and the pleasure
Got my whole life here in front of me
I'm taking over when I hit the streets

[Pre-Chorus]
Glamour, glitter and gold
Nothing is stopping you, nothing is stopping me
This frenzy, out of control
I must stay in pursue, do what I gotta do

[Chorus]
Give me them bright lights, long nights
Party till the sun is rising
High rise, over time
Work until the moon is shining
Hot guys, fly girls
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world
I feel on top of the world, hey

[Verse 2]
It's like a rollercoaster (yeah)
One step away; I'm closer
I can see it there within' my reach
Won't let the city get on top of me

[Pre-Chorus]
Glamour, glitter and gold
Nothing is stopping you, nothing is stopping me
This frenzy, out of control
I must stay in pursue, do what I gotta do

[Chorus]
Give me them bright lights, long nights
Party till the sun is rising
High rise, over time
Work until the moon is shining
Hot guys, fly girls
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world
I feel on top of the world, hey

[Bridge]
I can do it all night long (Nothing can stop me)
They can never place my home (Can't slow me down)
The only thing I know (Is that I won't fall)
And I have it all

[Chorus]
Give me them bright lights, long nights (oh, yeah)
High rise, over time
Work until the moon is shining
Hot guys, fly girls
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world
I feel on top of the world, hey
Give me them bright lights, long nights
Party till the sun is rising
High rise, over time
Work until the moon is shining
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world
I feel on top of the world, hey

[Outro]
Bright lights, long nights (Pussycat Dolls)
High rise, overtime
Hot guys, fly girls
Never thought I'd say
I feel on top of the world, I feel on top of the world
Hey
